description: Navigate to Hauptbahnhof/ZOB. The route proceeds straight along a wide paved pedestrian path with a large stone building on the left and a grassy area with trees on the right. It passes a U-Bahn station entrance on the left. The path ends at the street intersection near a traffic light and a signpost for Brockesstraße and Adenauerallee.
agent_refined_route: Head north along the pedestrian path [73m] -> Arrive at the intersection
agent_concise_description: The route proceeds straight along a wide paved pedestrian path with a large stone building on the left and a grassy area with trees on the right. It passes a U-Bahn station entrance on the left. The path ends at the street intersection near a traffic light and a signpost for Brockesstraße and Adenauerallee.
